baking_ingredients.name: Sysco Classic Cornflour
baking_ingredients.description: Fine maize flour powder for use as a thickening agent. Blends to a smooth cream with liquid, reducing the need for fats.
baking_ingredients.technicalDetails: Ingredients: 100% corn starch. Store in a cool, dry place. Once opened, store in an airtight container.

baking_ingredients.name: Organic Cane Sugar
baking_ingredients.description: Premium organic cane sugar with a rich, natural flavor. Perfect for all your baking needs.
baking_ingredients.technicalDetails: 100% organic cane sugar. Non-GMO and chemical-free. Store in a cool, dry place.

dairy_and_alternatives.name: Premium Dairy-Free Almond Milk
dairy_and_alternatives.description: Creamy almond milk made from the finest almonds. Great alternative to dairy milk for beverages and cooking.
dairy_and_alternatives.technicalDetails: Ingredients: Filtered water, almonds (2.5%), calcium carbonate, sea salt, stabilizers, vitamins D and B12.

dairy_and_alternatives.name: Organic Greek Yogurt
dairy_and_alternatives.description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt made with organic milk. Rich in protein and probiotics.
dairy_and_alternatives.technicalDetails: Contains live cultures including Lactobacillus bulgaricus and Streptococcus thermophilus. Keep refrigerated at 2-5°C.

dry_goods.name: Premium Basmati Rice
dry_goods.description: Aromatic basmati rice with long, fluffy grains. Perfect for a variety of cuisines.
dry_goods.technicalDetails: Aged for 12 months for enhanced flavor and aroma. Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

dry_goods.name: Imported Italian Arborio Rice
dry_goods.description: Traditional Italian Arborio rice, perfect for creating authentic creamy risottos. Medium grain with high starch content.
dry_goods.technicalDetails: Medium-grain rice with high amylopectin starch content. Store in a cool, dry place.

condiments_and_sauces.name: Professional Chef's Mayonnaise
condiments_and_sauces.description: Rich and creamy professional-grade mayonnaise. Perfect consistency for sandwiches, dressings, and dips.
condiments_and_sauces.technicalDetails: Made with free-range eggs. Contains egg, mustard. Shelf life of 6 months unopened. Refrigerate after opening.

condiments_and_sauces.name: Authentic Thai Sweet Chilli Sauce
condiments_and_sauces.description: Authentic sweet and spicy Thai chilli sauce. Balanced flavor profile with notes of garlic and ginger.
condiments_and_sauces.technicalDetails: Contains sugar, red chilli, garlic, vinegar. Heat level: medium. Shelf stable, refrigerate after opening.
